channel.title: Server connection problem HELP!
channel.description: Ok so this is a server connecting prob.. its not about my vps so don't go saying "wrong section" blahblahblah.. on my computer.. i have the 43594 port opened and all.. when i run my server it works fine.. but on my vps when i click run.bat on runelocus and on here and everywhere it says my server is offline.. i though this was because the port wasn't open.. but i'm trying to add it but idk what do put for name.. it asks for name:, port: (43594) and protocol: tcp.. any idea what i put for name? can i just put anything? i disabled the firewall but it still won't work! please help.. i spent 25$ on this vps..

item.title: Server connection problem HELP!
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

Ty guys lol right after i posted this i got it online thanks anyway all vps problems solved

Read full topic

item.title: Server connection problem HELP!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]The VPS is blocking the port, and there isn’t allowed to talk about VPS.

Try their community help section, as I told you multiple times.[/quote]I think you are allowed to. The rule that has VPS statement in it is about requests, and this isn’t a request for a VPS

Read full topic

item.title: Server connection problem HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

Windows 2008, I don’t know about 2003, probably the same thing. Go to your firewall settings, regardless of if it’s online or not, and create a new “Inbound Rule”, 43594, “Allow the connection”, name it whatever.
Make sure it’s TCP.

See image: http://i28.tinypic.com/2s1vqlc.png

Read full topic

item.title: Server connection problem HELP!
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

Ok so this is a server connecting prob… its not about my vps so don’t go saying “wrong section” blahblahblah… on my computer… i have the 43594 port opened and all… when i run my server it works fine… but on my vps when i click run.bat on runelocus and on here and everywhere it says my server is offline… i though this was because the port wasn’t open… but i’m trying to add it but idk what do put for name… it asks for name:, port: (43594) and protocol: tcp… any idea what i put for name? can i just put anything? i disabled the firewall but it still won’t work! please help… i spent 25$ on this vps…

Read full topic
